section.name: Setting global dozer configuration
section.p: All global configuration values can be set in the "Global Configuration" Tab.

section.name: Configuring mappings
section.p: Every classmapping is listed in the "Mapping" Tab. Mappings of classes and fields can be added by Popup menu or the action-buttons at the top. On the right side the mappings can be configured. Every Attribute or Element in the XML file is shown for editing.
